attributes.action: A Royal commision to oversee Social Services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We wish to see a Royal Commission installed to oversee the running of Social care Services in Britain. The removal of "Government Targets", and a set standard for all services across Britain - Currently each district interprets the rules how they see fit.

This should include equal rights for fathers, and the inclusion of common sense over political correctness.

These errors may not always result in a death - but they do ruin lives, and mistakes should not just be brushed under the carpet - Those responsible should be held accountable.
